fieldUpdates.description: Calculate the time between the case creation and resolution provided or closed.
fieldUpdates.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Resolution Provided'), now() - CreatedDate, IF(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Closed'), ClosedDate - CreatedDate,0) )
fieldUpdates.name: Time to Resolution

rules.fullName: Alert%3A AM Proserve Case Changes Status
rules.description: AM request to send them an alert when Proserve Cases change status
rules.formula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'ProServe' , !IsBlank( Account_Manager_Email__c), OR( ISCHANGED(Status), ISCHANGED(OwnerId) ) )

rules.description: Riz Request 112713 to send him an alert when Proserve Cases change status
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED( Status ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Consulting"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Training")))

rules.description: Change case owner if a case in the "Inbound Case Queue" is designated as "Beta Support" type.

rules.formula: AND ( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Service_Billing_Type__c, "Bill quarterly as delivered"),ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName , "6-Closed Won"), RecordTypeId = "01280000000Q6NX")
AND ( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Service_Billing_Type__c, "Billed up front"),ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName , "6-Closed Won"), RecordTypeId = "01280000000Q6NX")

rules.description: Set the Triage Complete flag once a case moves past Triage into an In Progress, Resolution Proposed or Closed status.
rules.formula: IF(AND( NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Triage"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "New"))) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Priority, "Level 0 - Unassigned Priority"))),true,false)

rules.description: Send email to contact with the latest update details
CNL New Case Alert sent

rules.fullName: Case Catch Cases Assigned Outside Support v2
rules.description: TSA-116 Automation to catch support cases assigned to people outside of support Added exclusion for Role:Everbridge System Administration - EM 10/30/18
rules.formula: NOT($UserRole.Name = "Everbridge Support Management") && NOT($UserRole.Name = "Everbridge Support Burlington Shift") && NOT($UserRole.Name = "Everbridge Support Colchester Shift") && NOT($UserRole.Name = "Everbridge Support Respond") && NOT($UserRole.Name = "Everbridge UMS Support") && NOT($UserRole.Name = "Everbridge Support Pasadena Day Shift") && NOT($UserRole.Name = "Everbridge Support Pasadena Night Shift") && NOT($UserRole.Name = "Everbridge System Administration") && $RecordType.Name = "Support" && ISPICKVAL( Case_Medium__c , "Support Center")

rules.fullName: Case Interface is set to Everbridge Dispatch
rules.description: case Interface is set to Everbridge Dispatch

rules.fullName: Case Interface is set to Signal
rules.description: case Interface is set to Signal

rules.fullName: Case moved to NC4 case queue
rules.description: When a case is moved to the NC4 Case Queue, send template INTERNAL: Everbridge Support -> CASE: Assigned to Queue INTERNAL
Workflow rule used by deal desk to close case

rules.fullName: Ensure Client Portal Cases Assigned to Support Queue

rules.formula: AND ( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Service_Billing_Type__c, "Fixed installments/amounts"),ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName , "6-Closed Won"), RecordTypeId = "01280000000Q6NX")

rules.description: Send Account Access email to the case contact, copy the account owner When Access Granted field is changed from Null
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( Implementation_Baseline_Configuration__c )&& !ISNULL(Implementation_Baseline_Configuration__c ) && NOT(IsPickVal(Product_Line__c, 'IPAWS only')) && NOT(IsPickVal(Product_Line__c, 'SnapComms')) && NOT(IsPickVal(Product_Line__c, 'RedSky'))

rules.description: When new Implementations Case is assigned notify appropriate AM manager
rules.formula: AND( Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'Inbound Implementation Queue' , RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Implementation' , CONTAINS('Local Government', Account.Vertical__c), OR( CONTAINS( 'New Business',TEXT(Opportunity__r.Type )), CONTAINS( 'Enterprise',TEXT(Opportunity__r.Type)) ) )

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 11
rules.description: Inbound Case Queue,Inbound Implementation Queue,EMEA Implementation Queue
When new Implementations Case is assigned notify appropriate AM manager
rules.formula: AND( Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'Inbound Implementation Queue' , RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Implementation' , !CONTAINS('Local Government', Account.Vertical__c), OR( CONTAINS( 'New Business',TEXT(Opportunity__r.Type )), CONTAINS( 'Enterprise',TEXT(Opportunity__r.Type)) ) )

rules.description: Set 'kickoff complete date' if RedSky Implementation Status = 'kick-of complete'
Field update to enter a value of 10 hours when an Implementation Case is created.

rules.booleanFilter: 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8
rules.description: By default the checkbox is unchecked. Anyone can check/uncheck the box. If a case is moved to any of the queues below, the checkbox should be checked automatically.

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
rules.description: Inbound Case Queue,Inbound Implementation Queue,EMEA Implementation Queue

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9
rules.description: Requests that an implementation survey is completed 72 hours after the case is closed. Exclude owner=Thomas Hagstrom 12/13/17 - EM

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 11 AND 12 AND 13 AND 14
rules.description: Requests that an implementation survey is completed 72 hours after the case is closed.

rules.formula: AND( RecordType.Name = 'Implementation' , TEXT(Product_Line__c) = 'Desktop Alerting', Opportunity__c = '0063x00001Z3P0aAAF', NOT(ISPICKVAL( Region__c , 'LATAM')), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Region__c , 'APAC')), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Region__c , 'EMEA')) )

rules.formula: AND ( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Service_Billing_Type__c, "Bill monthly as delivered"),ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName , "6-Closed Won"))
AND ( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Service_Billing_Type__c, "Service is Milestone billing"),ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName , "6-Closed Won"), RecordTypeId = "01280000000Q6NX")

Set values for Product, Case Origin

rules.fullName: Severity is set to High or Urgent
rules.description: When Severity is set to High or Urgent, an email notification should be sent to tsmanagersonly@everbridge.com
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Severity__c), OR( ISPICKVAL(Severity__c, 'Severity 2: High'), ISPICKVAL(Severity__c, 'Severity 1: Urgent')), OR( RecordTypeId == '01280000000Q3H4', RecordTypeId == '01280000000QDyT'))

rules.fullName: TS Assign JARVISS to Inbound Case Q
rules.description: Email-to-Case for JARVISS is assigned to the JARVISS Inbound Case Q and then reassigned to the Inbound Case Q. The process was changed after the original request was complete. Turned off per Melanie 0n 5/26/20

rules.fullName: TS Case Filter Google Message Approvals
rules.description: Filter out & set status= "Close Invalid" for all email to case sourced from support247@nixle.com, that do NOT require Google Message Approval action (abuse, feedback emails).

rules.description: Automatically set the case Status field to "In Progress Support" if "Call" is selected in the Case Origin field.

rules.fullName: TS New Pending Contact Input Clear

criteriaItems.value: 1 Waiting on Customer (Attempt 1),2 Waiting on Customer (Attempt 2)

rules.fullName: TS Nixle Google Approval Case Fields
rules.description: Auto fill in most generic, yet required fields for "Support Google Message Approval" (Nixle Pubs) case record types.

rules.fullName: TS Owner and Status at Escalation %28Support%29
rules.description:
This workflow triggers when the escalation on a case is requested/approved. It updates who the current case owner is and it changes the status to In Progress: Support.
Note: Due to not being clear, we duplicated WF for each recordtype.
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Escalation_Status__c) && ISPICKVAL(Escalation_Status__c,'Approved') && (RecordTypeId == '01280000000Q3H4' || RecordTypeId == '01280000000QDyT')

rules.fullName: TS Owner and Status at Escalation %28non-Support%29
rules.description:
This workflow triggers when the escalation on a case is requested/approved. It updates who the current case owner is and it changes the status to In Progress: Support.
Note: Due to not being clear, we duplicated WF for each recordtype.
Schedules an update to the case status to "Pending: Contact Input" based on the Contact Return Date field

rules.fullName: TS Set Pending Contact Input Date
rules.description: Note: Depending on the recordtype, the picklist value will be different
rules.formula: OR(AND( OR(ISNEW(),ISCHANGED(Status)), OR(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Pending: Contact Input'),ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Pending: Contact Input Final Request')), OR(RecordTypeId <> '01280000000Q3H4', RecordTypeId <> '01280000000QDyT') ), AND( OR(ISNEW(),ISCHANGED(Status)), OR(ISPICKVAL(Status, '1 Waiting on Customer (Attempt 1)'),ISPICKVAL(Status, '3 Waiting on Customer (Attempt 3)')), OR(RecordTypeId = '01280000000Q3H4', RecordTypeId = '01280000000QDyT') ) )

rules.fullName: TS Support Case Next Update Field Calculation NOC
rules.description: Automation to complete the "Next Update" field value based on “NOC” value in "Status" field

rules.fullName: TS Support Case Next Update Field Calculation TS
rules.description: Automation to complete the "Next Update" field value based on "In progress Support" value in "Status" field

rules.fullName: TS Support Case Next Update Field Calculation TS-QA
rules.description: Automation to complete the "Next Update" field value based on “Q/A” value in "Technology Team" field

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10

criteriaItems.value: Everbridge Dispatch,Respond,E Team,NC4 Risk Center,Signal,UMS SaaS

rules.description: Requests that a survey is completed 72 hours after the case is closed.

rules.fullName: TS%3A CSAT Survey Request for NC4
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10
rules.description: Requests that a survey is completed 72 hours after the case is closed.
When a Last Case Comment is updated, send a notification to TSEM owner.
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Last_Case_Comment__c) && NOT( ISBLANK(Last_Case_Comment__c) ) && ( TSEM_Owner__r.Id <> Case_Comment_Created_By_ID__c )
AND ( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Service_Billing_Type__c, "Time and Materials billed monthly"),ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName , "6-Closed Won"), RecordTypeId = "01280000000Q6NX")

rules.description: When a new case is created by the tech, it will mark created date as triage time.
rules.formula: OwnerId == CreatedById && OR(RecordTypeId == '01280000000Q3H4', RecordTypeId = '01280000000QDy') && $User.ProfileID__c != '00e34000001SrNp' && $User.ProfileID__c != '00e34000001SrO4' && $User.ProfileID__c != '00e34000001SrOE'

criteriaItems.value: Closed,Closed: Duplicate,Closed: Pending Product Fix,Closed Invalid

rules.description: if triage time stamp is empty when closing the case it needs to set the triage time stamp.
Set Status and Implementation Type when new Cases are created

rules.fullName: Update Parent Case Info on NOC Case
rules.description: Rule to update Parent Case Account Name and Parent Case Risk Rating fields on NOC Cases

rules.description: When a user created a case for salesforce support, update the case owner to = Salesforce Support Queue
rules.formula: RecordType.Name = 'Salesforce Support' && CreatedBy.Alias != 'EBAuto'
